definition: rock painting/picture or writing carved on rocks
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The primitive rock drawings on Jiangjun Cliff record the way of life of early humanity.
sentences.chinese: 古老的將軍崖原始巖畫記錄着原始人類的生活。

sentences.english: Drawing on rock is distributed mainly over the mountain rock of dry-grassland and desert-grassland area in north-China.
sentences.chinese: 我國巖畫主要分佈在北方乾旱荒漠草原區。

sentences.english: The Xinjiang rock paintings have many scenes of fertility worship.
sentences.chinese: 新疆巖畫多爲生殖崇拜的內容。

sentences.english: The paintings later became the "find of last century".
sentences.chinese: 後來，這些巖畫成了“上世紀最偉大的發現”。

sentences.english: The symbolism of the primordial petrous picture was almost the nature made.
sentences.chinese: 原始巖畫的象徵性幾乎是天籟所成。

sentences.english: Here the rock by the relevant experts as three thousand years ago remains of Serbs.
sentences.chinese: 這處巖畫經有關專家論證定爲距今三千年的塞人遺存。

sentences.english: Many Russia scholars believe ochre petroglyph were at the same age as slab-stone tombs'.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯學者普遍認爲赭石巖畫與石板墓的年代相當。

sentences.english: Many of these show wave oscillation and zigzag patterns.
sentences.chinese: 很多巖畫裏都有波浪形和Z字形。

sentences.english: Rock Paintings in Dushanzi Miquan City, Bo Yang River Kazakhstan nationality townships Dushanzi village.
sentences.chinese: 獨山子巖畫位於米泉市柏楊河哈薩克民族鄉獨山子村。

sentences.english: It was this very primitive symbolic thinking that made the primordial petrous picture full of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 正是原始象徵思維，使原始巖畫充滿詩性。
巴基斯坦吉拉斯巖畫十分著名。

sentences.english: The rock-paintings of Gong county is an important part of the system of rock paintings in China.
sentences.chinese: 珙縣懸棺巖畫是西南巖畫系統的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The rock-paintings of Gong county is an important part of the system of rock paintings in China.
sentences.chinese: 珙縣懸棺巖畫是西南巖畫系統的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: These creations cover an extensive region from east to west, from north to south in the nation.
sentences.chinese: 這些巖畫從東到西，自南至北，分佈地域十分廣泛。
